TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IXamlNameProvider

summary.span: 提供一个服务，该服务用于在保存和写入操作过程中输入对象，并返回 XAML 名称。

span.span: Provides a service that is used during save and write operations to input an object and return a XAML name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此服务只会与保存路径操作，例如何时序列化的特性化的值转换器用法，和类型转换器或值序列化程序支持序列化。This service is only relevant for a save path operation, such as when a serializes an attributed value converter usage, and the type converter or value serializer supports serialization. 一个不提供其服务上下文中的服务。A does not provide the service in its service context. 类型转换器或值序列化程序可以访问此服务作为服务提供商使用可用的架构上下文，然后获取在该上下文中实现的服务。A type converter or value serializer can access this service by using an available schema context as a service provider and then obtaining the service that is implemented in that context. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Type Converters and Markup Extensions for XAML](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-and-markup-extensions-for-xaml.md)并[Service Contexts Available to 类型转换器和标记扩展](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/service-contexts-available-to-type-converters-and-markup-extensions.md)。For more information, see [Type Converters and Markup Extensions for XAML](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-and-markup-extensions-for-xaml.md) and [Service Contexts Available to Type Converters and Markup Extensions](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/service-contexts-available-to-type-converters-and-markup-extensions.md). 若要正确使用 XAML 定义的名称，您可能还需要获取有关操作的信息 XAML 名称范围和值，该值表示它。To correctly use XAML-defined names, you may also need to obtain information about the acting XAML namescope and the value that represents it.

related.span: .NET framework XAML 服务概念文档

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetName(object value) cil managed
Public Function GetName (value As Object) As String

param.name: value
param.span: 要为其获取名称的对象。

span.span: The object to get the name for.

summary.span: 检索指定对象的 XAML 名称。

span.span: Retrieves the XAML name of the specified object.

returns.span: 所请求对象的 XAML 名称值。

span.span: The XAML name value of the requested object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认.NET Framework XAML 服务实现依赖于可以报告运行时对象图中使用的对象名称的 XAML 架构上下文。The default .NET Framework XAML Services implementation relies on a XAML schema context that can report the object names being used in the runtime object graph.
